citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15pm-2:45pm on
8-3-21.
I texted and called the licensee's contact number, knocked on the facility door, and honked the vehicle horn in an attempt
to reach the licensee. All attempts were unsuccessful. I waited at the facility for 30 minutes and left.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15pm-2:45pm on 
8-3-21. 
 
I texted and called the licensee's contact number, knocked on the facility door, and honked the vehicle horn in an attempt 
to reach the licensee.  All attempts were unsuccessful.  I waited at the facility for 30 minutes and left. 
 
 
 
End Section
